<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>cmdb_model_lifecycle</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Unique lifecycle creation per model</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) { if (!current.active) return;
var modelLifecycleGr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_model_lifecycle'); modelLifecycleGr.addQuery('source', current.source); modelLifecycleGr.addQuery('lifecycle_type', current.lifecycle_type); modelLifecycleGr.addQuery('lifecycle_phase', current.lifecycle_phase); modelLifecycleGr.addQuery('model', current.model); modelLifecycleGr.addQuery('active', true); modelLifecycleGr.query();
if (modelLifecycleGr.next() && modelLifecycleGr.getValue('sys_id') !== current.getValue('sys_id')) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('A record with the same combination of model, lifecycle type, lifecycle phase and source already exists')); current.setAbortAction(true); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-07-31 16:31:29</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>1a0e39a8b74333004dc06f28ee11a900</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Unique lifecycle creation per model</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Model Management" source="com.snc.model">1d64b8e83c31311068bcf327dfe37f3a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1a0e39a8b74333004dc06f28ee11a900</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-08-02 10:11:18</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1a0e39a8b74333004dc06f28ee11a900"/> </record_update>
